Name: This & Cats
About the game: Manage a shop in a small town while adopting and finding new homes for cats. Satisfy customers and rescue cats to earn money and rank up so that you can unlock new cats and improve your reputation. Start by collecting black & white cats and work you way up to the mythical Prismatic Kittens and Uranium Cats! 25+ Cat breeds to unlock 50+ products to sell in your shop Several upgrades available Name your cats whatever you want, and find them sitting in your shop to greet the customers Hidden secrets and mysteries...
Meta Title: This & Cats: Oct 21, 2021, Ryan Stephen and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on This & Cats? Check out the release date (Oct 21, 2021), developer insights from Ryan Stephen, and a complete game summary.
